projects.title: Arbor
projects.tagline: A visual thinking and brainstorming tool with AI-powered branching conversations.

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Arbor is a canvas-based application that enables non-linear exploration of ideas through AI-assisted conversations. Unlike traditional chat interfaces, Arbor lets you branch, fork, and visually connect multiple conversation threads.

sections.title: Features
items: AI-powered chat blocks with context awareness
Connect related ideas with visual links

sections.title: Technical Details
sections.content: Built with Next.js and TypeScript. Uses React Flow for the canvas implementation and integrates with OpenAI's API for conversational AI. Data persistence handled through Supabase and Prisma ORM.

projects.title: Amelia
projects.tagline: Cursor for Air Traffic Controllers — an AI-powered second brain that makes ATCs 10x more effective.

sections.title: The Problem
sections.content: Air traffic control is chronically understaffed, leading to delays, safety violations, and fatal accidents. Training an ATC takes up to 7 years, making workforce scaling nearly impossible.

sections.title: Our Solution
sections.content: Amelia augments air traffic controllers rather than replacing them. It aggregates real-time airline and weather data, identifies risks for flights within a 40 nautical mile radius, and automates communication with pilots using standardized FAA phraseology.

sections.title: Features
items: Real-time risk identification from flight and weather data
Automated pilot communication via voice synthesis
Insights surfaced using standardized FAA phraseology
Built on scraped NTSA accident/incident reports
